title: Expected counts for favorite color and age group

content.question:
Each person in a random sample of adults indicated his or her favorite color. The results, shown in the table below, are reported by age group of the respondents.

If choice of color is independent of age group, which of the following expressions is equal to the expected number of respondents who are aged 30 to 50, inclusive, and prefer green?

choices.label: Start fraction left parenthesis 99 right parenthesis left parenthesis 108 right parenthesis over 314 end fraction
Start fraction left parenthesis 69 right parenthesis left parenthesis 108 right parenthesis over 314 end fraction
Start fraction left parenthesis 35 right parenthesis left parenthesis 99 right parenthesis over 108 end fraction
Start fraction left parenthesis 35 right parenthesis left parenthesis 108 right parenthesis over 314 end fraction
Start fraction left parenthesis 35 right parenthesis left parenthesis 99 right parenthesis over 314 end fraction

content.answer: Start fraction left parenthesis 99 right parenthesis left parenthesis 108 right parenthesis over 314 end fraction

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine relative frequencies, proportions, or probabilities using simulation or calculations.
